name: Two Words Into One Will Go - Part 2 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Celestial body - and - emit a beam of light.

(Don't forget to read the hints)
Top part of shoe - and - laceration.
Equine creature - and - join in sport.
Sealed metal preserved food container - and - able.
Grey matter - and - cleanse with soap and water.
Furniture for sleep - and - beat music.
Building of judicial assembly - and - unit of length measurement.
Motor vehicle - and - to move away.
Strike with palm of hand - and - walking aid.
